column1: Highway Hop - Help the Frog Cross the Road
column2:
Intense fast paced action from start to finish, compete against your friends and the world via Game Center by dodging all the cars to see who can the highest score, along the way getting coins to unlock different cool vibrant colours of frogs.

Very challenging game swipe left and right to avoid the cars or tap to jump over them, but make sure your timing is accurate.

Brand new game released absolutely free and it's the full game, and updates will be coming soon, What are you waiting for DOWNLOAD NOW
How long can you survive?
